formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'VMCOUNT' =-
[Syntax] VMCOUNT(vmbox[@context][|folder])
[Synopsis] Counts the voicemail in a specified mailbox
[Description] context - defaults to "default" folder - defaults to "INBOX"

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,7 +1,7 @@ -= Info about function 'VMCOUNT' =-
[Syntax] - VMCOUNT(vmbox[@context][|folder]) + VMCOUNT(vmbox[@context][,folder])
[Synopsis] Counts the voicemail in a specified mailbox
